parameters.name: RefArray
parameters.description: Array of IRefPlane s, ISurface s, and/or IFace2 s

title: ISecondaryMemberSupportPlaneFeatureData.SetIntersectingPlanesAndFaces
description: Sets the planar entities that intersect the primary structure system member pairs used to create this secondary structure system member.

parameters.name: RefArray
parameters.description: Array of IRefPlane s, ISurface s, and/or IFace2 s

returns: True if intersecting planes and faces successfully set, false if not
remarks: During editing, RefArray can hold only one entity.
